articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Reserve eUSD Live Reserve launches Electronic Dollar (eUSD) on Ethereum and the MobileCoin chain. eUSD is backed by a basket of stablecoin derivatives (cUSDC, cUSDT, aUSDC, aUSDT) using Compound and Aave, and 100% of the yield that eUSD generates is directed to RSR stakers
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Reserve eUSD Live, Maker Reactivates D3M, Stable Farming on Osmosis, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Coinbase L2 Coniabse launched the testnet of Base, an Ethereum L2 built with the OP stack. The team does not plan to launch any token but announces the Base Ecosystem Fund to support early-stage projects building on Base. Synthetix V3 Deployed Synthetix deployed V3 on Ethereum mainnet and Optimism after audits.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase L2, Synthetix V3 Live, Innovative Perp Trading, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Collab.Land Token Launch Collab.Land, a Discord/Telegram wallet connection bot protocol, will launch its token and enable claims on Feb 23 at 6 pm MT. Verified community members and/or Membership/Patron NFT holders are eligible for the token drop. Frax to Fully Collateralize Its Stablecoin
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Collab.Land Token Launch, Frax to Fully Collateralize Its Stablecoin, Treasury Yields, and More...

articles.description: Coinbase to Support EUROC Coinbase will add support for EUROC on Ethereum and will enable trading for EUROC pairs after 9 AM PT on 22 February 2023. Perennial Live on Arbitrum Cash-settled derivatives protocol Perennial launches on Arbitrum. Check our
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase to Support EUROC, Perennial Live on Arbitrum, NFT Aggregator Potential Airdrop , and More...

articles.description: Revert Exploit AMM liquidity management protocol Revert confirmed that their â€œv3utilsâ€ contract was hacked, and 90% of the funds were stolen from a single account. The team stated that they would compensate each victim and provide a post-mortem soon.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Revert Exploit, Hong Kong to Relax Crypto Ban, NFT Lending, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Flashbots MEV-Share Research firm Flashbots proposes MEV-Share, a matchmaking protocol that shares MEV (Maximal Extractable Value) gains with Ethereum users. According to the proposal, MEV-Share would be an early implementation of SUAVE, which is a blockchain that would aim to decentralize the block-building process.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Flashbots MEV-Share, Kava 12 Live, Borrow to Earn, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Blur Token Live NFT marketplace Blur launched its native token BLUR and airdropped 360m of tokens to the participants of the season 1 campaign. Season 2 also began and traders can earn points for future rewards by bidding/listing NFTs on the marketplace.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Blur Token Launch, Pendulum Live, Passive Yield on Stablecoin, and More...

articles.description: Binance to Move Away from BUSD Binance CEO tweeted that Binance will move away from using BUSD as the main trading pair as the team foresees users migrating to other stablecoins over time. Issued by Paxos, BUSD is the main trading stablecoin on Binance. Paxos will
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Binance to Move Away from BUSD, rETH Live on Aave, Risk-Isolated Lending, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Aave GHO on Testnet Aave launched its stablecoin GHO on the Ethereum testnet Goerli. The GHO code has been audited and is available on Github. Silo Live on Arbitrum Lending protocol Silo launched on Arbitrum, initially supporting risk-isolated markets for DPX, UMAMI, and MAGIC.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Aave GHO on Testnet, Silo on Arbtirum, Meta DEX Aggregator, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Flux Finance Live Flux Finance, a lending project that connects US treasuries with DeFi, is live. Users can either deposit stablecoins to earn yield, or put US treasuries (OUSG) as collateral to borrow against. Acala EVM+ Acala launches the EVM+ mainnet, an evm compatible chain running on Polkadotâ€™s modular blockchain framework, Substrate
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Acala EVM Live, Chiliz L1 Live, NFT Market Cap Token, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Lido V2 Coming Lido introduces V2 which will bring two major upgrades: Staking Router: A new modular architecture that allows anyone (incl. solo stakers) to become a Node Operator. Withdrawals: An upgrade allowing stETH holders to withdraw directly from the Beacon Chain.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Lido V2 Coming, Zhejiang Shapella Live, Social Trading, and More...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - Trader Joe Integrates LayerZero, Stargate to Re-Issue STG, LP to Earn Funding Rates, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Connext Amarok Live Bridging protocol Connext launches Amarok. This upgrade enables developers to build crossrollup apps that directly rely on the security of Ethereum. Users can now access the bridge UI, passively LP for the ecosysteum by depositing USDC & ETH, or actively by running a router.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Connext Amarok Live, Synthetix V3 Coming, Auto-Compounding Yield, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Optimism Bedrock Coming Optimism Foundation proposed Bedrock, the next upgrade to Optimism that will bring improvements to the network including transaction costs, throughput characteristics, and sync speeds. Pirex for GMX Live Redacted Cartel launches Pirex for GMX (liquid wrapper for staked GMX and staked GLP). Users are now able to deposit GMX and/or GLP and receive either pxGMX or pxGLP that earn yield as if the underlying tokens were max staked on GMX natively.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Optimism Bedrock Coming, Pirex for GMX Live, Interest Rate Derivatives, and More...
